column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Friday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from November 18 to December 9, 2002.      The minutes are attached.Attachment (66 KB PDF)2003 Monetary policyHome |News and eventsAccessibility Last update: February 7, 2003
